title: Results of Raymundo’s Vegas Bet + Favorite Desserts Draft + Drama Ensues Now That Show Softball Team Is Happening
itunes:title: Results of Raymundo’s Vegas Bet + Favorite Desserts Draft + Drama Ensues Now That Show Softball Team Is Happening
description:
We find out the results of the $250 bet that Raymundo made in Vegas with the money Bobby gifted him. We draft our favorite desserts in our show draft. Bobby says that the show’s softball team will be happening in August...but now there’s an added piece of drama.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
